title: Add "suffix" argument to TempFile function
body:
by **dylan.g.maxwell**: 
It would be useful to generate temporary files (and probably temporary directories too)
with a specified prefix AND suffix. 

My specific use case is this:  I execute a command and pipe the output to a temp file.
Then I use the ServeFile function serve this temp file.  The ServeFile relies (at least
partly) on the file extension to determine content type of the response.
